document_data.name: Nantarn Council
document_data.mainbody: The '''Nantarn Council''' was the council of twelve formed to govern the underwater city of [[Myth Nantar]]. As of [[1369 DR]], there were only nine members, but this left three unoccupied seats.

Seats in 1369 DR.[[Merfolk]] Seat: Princess [[Arina]], seventh in line for the merfolk monarch's throne
Seats in 1369 DR.[[Sea elf|Sea Elf]] Seat: [[Morgan Ildacer]], captain of the High Mages' guard of [[Sylkiir]]
Seats in 1369 DR.[[Triton]] Seat: [[Nalos]] of [[Pumanath]], centurion of the sixth squad of [[Abydos]]
Seats in 1369 DR.High Mage's Seat: [[Pharom Ildacer]], elder surviving High Mage and cousin of Morgan Ildacer
Seats in 1369 DR.[[Kupavi]] Dukar Seat: [[Jorunhast]], the exiled Royal Mage of [[Cormyr]] and senior Kupavi lorekeeper
Seats in 1369 DR.[[Maalimi]] Dukar Seat: [[Tu'ola'sara]], a Wanderers' Caste shalarin lorekeeper from [[Ys'bhol]] and trained in Myth Nantar
Seats in 1369 DR.[[Numosi]] Dukar Seat: [[Tagar Lusos]], a sea elf peacekeeper from [[Lyrathil]]
Seats in 1369 DR.[[Order of Jhimari|Jhimari]] Dukar Seat: Empty due to lack of any Jhimari students or teachers
Seats in 1369 DR.The Gods' Seat: Empty for the symbolism that all the sea gods watch the council and are welcome to seat themselves
